npc.label: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker)
npc.name: Warrior (Attacker) 1
npc.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

npc.label: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Defender)
npc.name: Warrior (Defender) 1
npc.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Ruby imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Ruby. Ruby must be able to see the attacker.

npc.label: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker)
npc.name: Warrior (Attacker) 2
npc.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Ruby imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Ruby. Ruby must be able to see the attacker.

npc.label: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker)
npc.name: Warrior (Attacker) 14
npc.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Ruby’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Ruby can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Ruby can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Ruby’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Ruby’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
trait.text: Ruby can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Ruby can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: Ruby’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. she can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.
